changelog.title: PDF Manager: Quality of Life Updates
changelog.summary: Added search highlighting, undo option, change previews, and more

changelog.title: PDF Manager: State Persistence
changelog.summary: The PDF Manager state now persists between refreshes so users won't lose progress.

changelog.title: Browser Extension: TÅ«lBOX Tables
changelog.summary: A new browser extension to download HTML tables from internal systems.

roadmap.title: Production Search improved results
roadmap.summary: Improved search results when searching by category.

roadmap.title: Cue Sheet Converter Formats
roadmap.summary: Add support for RapidCue cue sheet format.

roadmap.title: Cue Sheet Converter Formats
roadmap.summary: Add support for Cuetrak cue sheet format.

roadmap.title: Browser Extension
roadmap.summary: A new browser extension to connect directly to internal systems.

roadmap.title: Browser Extension: Hotkeys
roadmap.summary: A new browser extension that adds shortcut keys to internal web app.
